commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas8929db3"

diff:
"8929db3 bug 394190 - seamonkey/thunderbird not starting up due to manifest embedding issues.  change manifest embedding in the non-libxul case (follow up patch, forgot to address review comment).  r=bsmedberg, a=bz
diff --git a/config/rules.mk b/config/rules.mk
index b9ed4838..6951398 100644
--- a/config/rules.mk
+++ b/config/rules.mk
@@ -163,7 +163,7 @@ ifneq (,$(filter OS2 WINNT WINCE,$(OS_ARCH)))
 IMPORT_LIBRARY		:= $(LIB_PREFIX)$(LIBRARY_NAME).$(IMPORT_LIB_SUFFIX)
 endif
 
-ifeq ($(MOZ_ENABLE_LIBXUL),1)
+ifdef MOZ_ENABLE_LIBXUL
 EMBED_MANIFEST_AT=2
 endif
 
"
